medium: Pen and black ink and brush and gray wash over black chalk, on beige laid paper
creditline: Gift of Emily Townsend Vermeule, honorary degree holder of the Class of 1989 and Cornelius Clarkson Vermeule III, in memory of Alphaeus Hyatt Mayor, Class of 1922, George Rodney Meneely, Class of 1933, and Cornelius Clarkson Vermeule, Jr., Class of 1917
inscribed:

in graphite: 750

exhibitions.citation: Medals to Masters: Drawings and Medals. The Italian Renaissance to Modern America, April 1987 - August 1987

caption: Unknown Italian artist, Death of Saint Joseph. Pen and black ink and brush and gray wash over black chalk, on beige laid paper; 24.6 × 18.7 cm. Gift of Emily Townsend Vermeule, honorary degree holder of the Class of 1989 and Cornelius Clarkson Vermeule III, in memory of Alphaeus Hyatt Mayor, Class of 1922, George Rodney Meneely, Class of 1933, and Cornelius Clarkson Vermeule, Jr., Class of 1917 (1997-575)
